summary: This document is a detailed billing statement for Jeffrey E. Epstein's AT&T wireless account, covering the billing cycle from June 13 to July 12, 2003. It includes charges for various services, payments received, and a summary of call details, including numerous incoming and outgoing calls to various locations.
